str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
From lego; something said; by implication, a topic, also reasoning or motive; by extension, a computation; specially, the Divine Expression.
From the base of peran; properly, through, i.e. Around; figuratively with respect to; used in various applications, of place, cause or time.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To hear, listen, comprehend by hearing; pass: is heard, reported. A primary verb; to hear.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
(a) the ear, (b) met: the faculty of perception. Apparently a primary word; the ear.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From a compound of ek and a derivative of kaleo; a calling out, i.e. a popular meeting, especially a religious congregation.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
Of Hebrew origin; Hierusalem, the capitol of Palestine.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From ek and apostello; to send away forth, i.e. to despatch, or to dismiss.
Of Chaldee origin; son of Nabas; Barnabas, an Israelite.
To pass through, spread (as a report). From dia and erchomai; to traverse.
From Antiochus; Antiochia, a place in Syria.
